recipesJson.name: Blood Mango Ice
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: This is a Blood Orange, Mango, and Tangerine recipe topped with Ice

reviews.text: I always have this in my rotation. Even people on the street who don't vape give me compliments about the awesome perfumecI am wearing ðŸ˜‚
Not too sweet not too cold - perfection. Nice two flavor banger - these fruits pair well together. Wicked ADV for summer.
This is my ADV for the summer delicious refreshing you hit the spot again Wayne.
Excellent mango vape for the summer days. So refreshing and full of flavour, just delicious Wayne.
